cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("split")

	SPLIT("", "src", "/")
	SPLIT("dst", "src", "/")
	SPLIT("", "src", ":")
	SPLIT("dst", "src", ":")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: split
processors:
  - split:
      tag: split_src_283275cd
      field: src
      separator: /
  - split:
      tag: split_src_into_dst_c10d1bb2
      field: src
      separator: /
      target_field: dst
  - split:
      tag: split_src_e38dd0b0
      field: src
      separator: ':'
  - split:
      tag: split_src_into_dst_a08379e5
      field: src
      separator: ':'
      target_field: dst
